FAQ / Wave 2 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Autobot Springer - Aerial Defense

  1. Can the Better Things To Do Than Die stratagem be used on Sergeant Springer? [Source: Community]
    No. It is solely for Autobot Springer - Aerial Defense. The lack of "Autobot" in the stratagem target is believed to be unintended.
